title: When someone complains I picked Gangplank over an "OP" meta pick
body:
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/82/82eb91d77b29094a6dada58232b7e689a85f00834d7687db4567b5db017b8f94.jpg

Then I see them play a meta champion and feed while I carry

https://heavyeditorial.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/3141.jpg?quality=65&strip=all&w=640

replies.body:
Here:

http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m1xor40o5o1qitzos.gif

(Wow that's small)
Funny part is that in the third movie, Captain Edward Teague the Keeper of the Code says "The code is the law."

Well that's the point. People in power want to think that they have hard rules for everything but pirates don't really care about that so they consider them more like guidelines. It's a matter of perspective
he also happened at the time to be ready to kill every man in there that disagreed with him
http://www.relatably.com/m/img/make-private-memes/SO-TELL-ME-102ved.jpg
Did you misread that as "Pirate life" ?
yah didn't bother to fix it

imagine its privateer instead of private aaaannnnd there you go

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/creepypasta/images/e/ee/Spongebob-imagination.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140908000844

Now that is a thought I can get behind!

Have my upvote, random ~~stranger~~ pirate on the internet!

https://media1.giphy.com/media/MAqfdfQu0vhNm/200.gif
teemo jungle is actually pretty OP, unless the enemy steals your camps... then you might as well be AFK.
Gangplank IS an op meta pick?

Wouldn't call him meta when he's not the most popular guy sitting at like 5% play rate top, 1.5% mid, and 1.5% ban rate in 6.11

Meanwhile Zed, Fizz, Ekko, and Swain got way higher pick/ban rates in both those spots this patch even after some nerfs

He's one of those guys only heavy GP players (like me) would dare blindly play in ranked

Maybe he isnt op but he is definitely meta. People dont complain about not picking ekko, they get mad that shit wasnt banned in the first place.

And picking him blind is pretty easy mate, he afk farms from range and ults for free assists or kills. No champion hard counters that.

Hes a strong champion you cant refute this lol.

Of course he's strong in the right hands, do you think I'd dare try to rank up by maining an unplayable champ?

And I don't think a 5% pick rate at max makes him meta, that puts him in the position of "only people who main him play him", unless OCE standards are way different

In the right hands makes him sound like hes hard to play, he really isnt lol.

You have extremely narrow minded idea of meta and not meta. There is a middle ground between ekko and urgot. Gangplank is like ahri, her banrate is tiny, not a common LCS pick and isnt zed tier, but she certainly is strong in most peoples hands. 

Your thread made the emplication that winning with GP is supposed to be surprising or that people would look at you funny for picking him or something. No one would ever complain about that pick.

Come on over to NA Gold/Plat where picking someone not in LCS instantly makes you a troll :3

And did I ever claim that winning with GP is supposed to be surprising? You simply interpreted that way thinking on it way too hard, and perhaps you and I view what counts as meta as different. Personally I do not consider Ahri a meta pick, I consider her and GP to be those off-meta Tier 2 picks that do well against meta champions

That or you're just here to look for a fight on a M&G thread that was meant to be silly and not serious :(

http://i.imgur.com/Ks35oeV.gif?noredirect

Th' way it be supposed to sail, mate.

_An' upvote for ye._
https://img.pandawhale.com/post-34554-dwarven-forged-upvote-gif-dwar-H1Et.gif

I went Karthus Top.

Suffice to say every time they dived me they died but i also died.

And these epic ultimate steals xD
I just got my first S with gp on my last game
{{champion:41}} is meta though.. LCK play him mid or even top all the time.
Those were in older patches, what about now when he's generally considered by non-GP solo players to be dead after Triforce changes
